ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Genericos import GNProjeto
view = widget.View view.FieldDefinitions["NIVELSUPERIOR"].Visible = False
entity = widget.Entity if entity == None: return if entity["HANDLE"].GetInt64() == 0 : return
view.Commands["CMD_SPED"].Visible = GNProjeto.ExibirBotaoSped( entity["HANDLE"].GetInt64() );
